nodes.text: The P1 adminmech was a model of adminmech droid that could have white or orange colored plating. They had two stocky legs supporting a frustum-shaped body. In 10 BBY, one P1 adminmech droid was forced to fight in the droid arena of the establishment known as the Lodge on the planet Vandor.

It was destroyed in the arena  when the gladiator droid WG-22 drove a circular saw through the top of the droid.  Another P1 designated P1-SZE was working as a slave in the control center of the Pyke Syndicate's spice mines on the planet Kessel until it was freed in 10 BBY during the slave revolt led by the droid L3-37.

The P1 adminmech first appeared in the 2018 Anthology Series film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. The model was not named in the film, but was identified in the video "Every Droid in Star Wars", which was posted on StarWarsKids.com in 2019.
